title: Manage Amenity Booking
description: A tenant in a managed apartment building wants to book the community party room for a weekend event.

tasks.description: Receive the tenant's request to book the party room for a specific date and time.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the tenant and their request.

tasks.description: Check the amenity booking calendar to see if the room is available at the requested time.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the party room is available.

tasks.description: Book the room for the tenant, charge any applicable reservation fee to their ledger, and send them a confirmation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully reserves the room and communicates with the tenant.
